sections.heading: Signature, defined.Signature means personalized evidence indicating authentication of the work performed by the real property appraiser and the acceptance of the responsibility for content, analyses, conclusions, and compliance with the Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice in a repor
sections.text: Signature, defined.Signature means personalized evidence indicating authentication of the work performed by the real property appraiser and the acceptance of the responsibility for content, analyses, conclusions, and compliance with the Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice in a report.SourceLaws 2014, LB717, ยง 11;Laws 2016, LB731, ยง 5.
